response.summary: Chemical engineer with 6+ years’ experience in consulting, helping customers to improve their metrics through operational impact. With skills in Data Analytics and Machine Learning to predict and classify information that solves business problems, using languages such as Python and SQL, able to work in environments such as GCP and AWS. With great interest in Neural Networks and Computer Vision.
response.skills: Microsoft Office, Microsoft Excel, Trabajo en equipo, Ingeniería de procesos, Tratamiento de aguas, Liderazgo de equipos, Ingeniería química, Comunicación asertiva en la toma de decisiones para la solución de problemas

profile_positions.description:
Increase efficiency in data collection allowing improvements in health management:
-	Use NLP techniques to process more than 50M medical histories, extracting key variables to enable auditing, KPI calculations, and dashboard design for multiple cohorts using Tableu.
-	Design pipelines in GCP to process 200k+ medical reports to construct the High Cost Account.

profile_positions.description:

profile_positions.description:
Built from scratch the Machine Learning and Data Science projects necessary for the business operations and growth.

House Flipping Project – Blackwood Capital:
- Data cleaning of over 168 million records and identification of 92 thousand properties that were flipped in the last 9 years in Miami Dade County.
- Training and development of multiple predictive models to determine the probability of a specific property to be flipped.
